nodes.text: The L-s9.3 laser cannon was a type of laser cannon that was manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems.
More destructive than the new but more common Sienar Fleet Systems L-s7.2 laser cannon, it had the power to destroy small asteroids in one shot.

Developed by Sienar Fleet Systems weapons division to provide added firepower against shielded Rebel fighters. The L-s9.3 laser cannon was most notably used as the primary armament of the Imperial TIE/IN interceptor. However, this weapon was also heavily used by the TIE Avenger and the TIE/D Defender. It could also be fitted to the TIE Advanced x1 and the TIE/LN starfighters. The TIE Predator was armed with four of the cannons.
